name: Materloss
description:
Elevator Pitch

As a Game Programmer, this game is my very first developed game, it was made for my University's Laboratory Internship's final assignment. The language of the game is Bahasa Indonesia, maybe in the future English will be added into the game.

===========================================================

STORY

Marshall, a sad little Panda was told by her mother to get some medicine in the village. Something strange happens to Marshall on her way to the village, will Marshall survive?

===========================================================

CONTROLS

Movements : Arrow Keys

Abilities : Q,W,E

==========================================================

CREDITS

(list of assets that I downloaded online)

SOUND:

  • Footsteps in woods loop (https://mixkit.co/free-sound-effects/footsteps/)
  • Blow breaking the air and Short boxing punch (https://mixkit.co/free-sound-effects/punch/)
  • Cinematic whoosh fast transition and Terror sweep of darkness (https://mixkit.co/free-sound-effects/transition/)
  • Forest at night (https://mixkit.co/free-sound-effects/forest/ )
  • Scary forest at night (https://mixkit.co/free-sound-effects/scary-woods/)
  • Cinematic horror heartbeat transition (https://mixkit.co/free-sound-effects/horror/)
  • Collecting Items (http://freesoundeffect.net/sound/pickup-generic-pickup-sfx-collection-item-15-sound-effect)
  • Spirit in the Woods by Alejandro Magaña (A. M.) (https://mixkit.co/free-stock-music/mood/mysterious/)

2D Asset:

  • Dark background (https://media.istockphoto.com/photos/dark-background-with-a-spotlight-in-the-center-picture-id1002995898?k=6&m=1002995898&s=170667a&w=0&h=d21_D2EIGuazskXU4R8ydxvIJyueZdMgPdFrOPIZNzU=)
  • Blood Effect (https://lpc.opengameart.org/content/blood-effect-sprite-sheet)
  • Light and Shadows (https://github.com/bitbrain/godot-tutorials/tree/main/2d-lighting) (https://godotengine.org/asset-library/asset/116)
  • Fragment Container (https://github.com/GDQuest/godot-demos/tree/master/2018/05-10-game-user-interface.)
  • Blood Splatter

DIALOGUE:

All of the dialogue in this game was made using Dialogic Plugin, big thanks to Emilio Coppola (https://github.com/coppolaemilio/dialogic) (https://itch.io/profile/coppolaemilio)
